text.title: David Herszenhaut
text.subtitle: Georgia Tech graduate, Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
text.caption: Hi, my name is David. I am a recent graduate of the Georgia Institute of Technology (B.Sc. in Computer Science). I am currently looking for software engineering position.

projects.name: Paintr
projects.description: A simple graphics editor built from the ground up using the Swing toolkit for Java. Functionality includes saving and loading multiple canvases, right click gestures, snap-to-grid movement, and canvas switching animations.

projects.name: SmarTrek
projects.description: SmarTrek is a web application built for the Summer 2019 ITC Hackathon that helps you pick the safest route to your destination. Supports several routes for each of walking, bicycling, driving, and riding transit.

projects.name: Dungeon Crawler
projects.description: A basic action role-playing game where you take control of a knight fighing different monsters on your way to treasure.

projects.name: OpenEval
projects.description: An anonymous survey web application that allows Georgia Tech professors to receive feedback on their teaching.

projects.name: Possibility of Precipitation
projects.description: A Game Boy Advance game written in C that takes inspiration from the game 'Risk of Rain'.

projects.name: Dota Data
projects.description: A series of D3.js data visualizations.

projects.name: PyBot
projects.description: A chat bot for Discord built using the discord.py API wrapper.

projects.name: metal_concerts
projects.description: A Python script to find interesting metal concerts near me.

projects.name: Word Clock
projects.description: A clock that tells time with words.

projects.name: hex2rgb
projects.description: A tool to convert a color code from hexadecimal to RGB.

projects.name: hexclock
projects.description: A hexadecimal clock that changes color with each passing second.

projects.name: Flask Web Application
projects.description: A simple website built using the Flask framework.
